title: Moneyview To Cleo-Here Are Five Useful AI-Powered Tools To Help Manage Your Finances
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) has made its way into almost all spheres of our lives, and it's also changing the way we do banking and manage personal finance. From budgeting to investing, AI-powered tools can help you keep it easy, quick and effective. These AI tools analyse your habits, estimate your needs, and give personalised guidance on how much you can save each month.

title: AI must be used prudently and with integrity: Brunei Sultan
description: KUALA LUMPUR: Sultan Hassanal Bolkiah said that although the use of artificial intelligence (AI) has had a major impact on the way management is carried out in the education ecosystem, it must be used prudently and with integrity, and not as a substitute for effort and wisdom.

title: AI’s war on journalism will decide the fate of the free press
description: The EU’s approach to how artificial intelligence uses journalistic work could determine whether the free press survives the digital age – or vanishes into the data stream
content:
A quiet war is underway in Europe – one that will decide whether journalism remains a pillar of democracy, or dissolves into the hum of the data economy.
For years, news organisations have had an uneasy pact with Silicon Valley. Google and Meta took ... [5098 chars]

title: How To Use Your Liberal Arts Degree To Secure An IT Job?
description: Cognizant Technology Solutions, one of world's largest IT firms, is taking a bold stance on how artificial intelligence will reshape the future of hiring, with the company looking to broaden its workforce horizon that will include liberal arts graduates and non-STEM students. In an interview with Fortune, Cognizant's CEO, Ravi Kumar S, explained how AI is ushering in a new trend of hiring. He adds that the AI is not a displacement strategy but an amplifier of human potential.
content: Cognizant Technology Solutions, one of the world’s largest IT firms, is ready to challenge the status quo of tech hiring, stating that an arts degree may be all you need to thrive in the ever-evolving tech space, which will now be dominated by artifi... [1977 chars]
